timeline.bodyText:
please add it (in addition) to:
https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/config/checkstyle_resources_checks.xml
https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/config/checkstyle_non_main_files_checks.xml
There will be violation over empty file that you just created , please add it to suppression like https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/config/checkstyle_resources_suppressions.xml#L70
timeline.author: romani

       <property name="message"
                 value="First sentence in a comment should start with a capital letter"/>
   </module>
+  <module name="RegexpMultiline">

replies.bodyText: @romani There are total 30 violations. Should I add all of them to suppression and solve them in a separate issue or should I solve them in this issue itself?
replies.author: Gaurav-Punjabi

replies.bodyText: yes, as you did not show them in comment, I will review them in PR, and we can fix them in separate PR if required, but most likely such files are required for testing. If some of them for specific javadoc Check - please skip whole folder (rather then by single files)
replies.author: romani

replies.bodyText: Added the suppression. But there was one weird thing that I don't understand. I had to add suppressions to both config/checkstyle_resources_suppressions.xml and config/checkstyle_non_main_files_suppressions.xml otherwise they were generating violations.
replies.author: Gaurav-Punjabi

replies.bodyText:
good point.
I am not sure why we have overlap between configs.
please remove Check instance from config/checkstyle_resources_suppressions.xml and its supporession file.
checkstyle_non_main_files_suppressions.xml - will cover all repo.
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: please keep it. On such files there should no violations too.
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText: But this test is failing due to this change, a file with comment does not generate a violation. Are you suggesting that I should change the expected violations to no violations?
replies.author: Gaurav-Punjabi

replies.bodyText:
it should not generate violation - it is by design.
Tests is good to show that.
replies.author: romani

replies.bodyText:
please restore test method in original place, not need to remove it and add it at other place.
We need to minimize diff.
replies.author: romani
